channel.title: CVE Feed for Facebook -- Wangle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Facebook -- Wangle

item.title: CVE-2019-3554|2024-08-04T19:12:09.432Z -- facebook -- wangle
item.description: Wangle's AcceptRoutingHandler incorrectly casts a socket when accepting a TLS 1.3 connection, leading to a potential denial of service attack against systems accepting such connections. This affects versions of Wangle prior to v2019.01.14.00

item.title: CVE-2019-3563|2024-08-04T19:12:09.559Z -- facebook -- wangle
item.description: Wangle's LineBasedFrameDecoder contains logic for identifying newlines which incorrectly advances a buffer, leading to a potential underflow. This affects versions of Wangle prior to v2019.04.22.00
